bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Coot cannot be intalled due to missing file libgsl.so.0
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): gsl-2.1-4.fc24.x86_64 coot-0.8.2-1.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. su -c 'dnf install coot'
Actual results: Last metadata expiration check: 0:33:25 ago on Tue May 17 21:05:39 2016. Error: nothing provides libgsl.so.0 needed by coot-0.8.2-1.fc24.i686 (try to add '--allowerasing' to command line to replace conflicting packages)
Expected results: successful installation
Looks like coot hasn't been built against up-to-date gsl. Reassigning.
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
